title: About
cleaned_text: The Naturophathic Physicians Medical Board The Naturopathic Physicians Medical Board was established pursuant to law Title 32, Chapter 14 (A.R.S. §32-1501, et. seq.), which regulates naturopathic physicians licensed in the State of Arizona. The Board also regulates naturopathic medical students certified for clinical training, graduates certified to participate in preceptorship training, and naturopathic medical assistants who work under the supervision of a licensed naturopathic physician. Further, the Board processes and issues certificates to dispense, and certificates to conduct preceptorship training to licensees. The Board functions to ensure the citizens of Arizona have a safe and dependable choice of healthcare providers when choosing a Naturopathic Physician. Our Mission It is our duty and mission to protect the Public through Regulation of the Practice of Naturopathic Medicine. Gail Anthony, Executive Director [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#0661676f6a286768726e69687f46686228677c28616970) Board Email: [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#70191e161f301e145e110a5e171f06) Main Number: 602 542-8242 Office Hours: 8:00 am - 5:00 pm Monday - Friday, Except State Holidays Board Members - Dr. Bruce Sadilek, N.M.D. - Chair, Physician Member, Term Expiration 6/30/2027 - Dr. Brian Popiel, N.M.D. - Vice Chair, Physician Member, Term Expiration 6/30/2026 - Vacant Public Member, Term Expiration 6/30/2026 - Dr. Daniel Rubin, N.D. - Physician Member, Term Expiration 6/30/2024 - Dr. Tam Spat, N.D. - Physician Member, Term Expiration 6/30/2022 - Diva Galan - Public Member, Term Expiration 6/30/2026 - Dr. Clinton C. Campbell, Ph.D. -Secretary, Public Member, Term Expiration 6/30/2026 Laws pertaining to Naturopathic Doctors and Assistants, as well as Health Professionals, licensed in the state of Arizona can be found below.
